00198 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00199 {
00200     totalTime_ = globalThresholdingTime_ + templateFilteringTime_ + averagingFilteringTime_ + regionsExtractionTime_ + slantingCorrectionTime_\
00201                  + spacesLocationFindingTime_;
00202 };
